tools.name: Selenium
tools.description: An open-source framework for automating web browsers, supporting multiple programming languages and browsers.

tools.name: Playwright
tools.description: A Node.js library for browser automation that supports multiple browsers and provides capabilities for testing modern web applications.

tools.name: JMeter
tools.description: An open-source tool designed for load testing and measuring the performance of web applications and other services.

tools.name: Postman
tools.description: A collaboration platform for API development, enabling users to design, test, and monitor APIs.

tools.name: Pytest
tools.description: A JavaScript-based end-to-end testing framework for web applications, providing fast and reliable testing capabilities.

tools.name: JIRA
tools.description: A popular project management and issue tracking tool used for bug tracking and Agile project management.

tools.name: TestRail
tools.description: A comprehensive test case management tool that helps teams manage, track, and organize test cases and results.

tools.name: Zephyr
tools.description: A leading test management solution that integrates with JIRA, providing real-time test metrics and reporting.

tools.name: Git
tools.description: A distributed version control system to track changes in source code during software development.

tools.name: GitHub
tools.description: A platform for version control and collaboration, allowing multiple people to work on projects at once.
